SA11sanss19u:4: sa tathāgatacaitye vā tathāgatavigrahe vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dadat sarvasatvānāṃ dauḥśīlyadaurgandhyamalâpanayanāya tathāgataśīlapratilambhāya ca pariṇāmayati /
SA11sanss19u:7: sa puṣpacchatram āropayan sarvasatvānāṃ sarvakleśaparidāhavigamāya pariṇāmayati /
SA11sanss19u:8: sa vihāraṃ praviśann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:13: sa labhanadvāram udghāṭayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:19: sa dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:21: sa tato vyuttiṣṭhann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:23: sa śarīragatyā gacchann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:27: sa śaucaṃ kurvann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:29: sa hastau prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:33: sa pādau prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati sarvasatvānām anekaprakārāṇi kleśarajāṃsy apanayeyaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:36: sa dantakāṣṭhaṃ bhakṣayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:42: punar aparaṃ śāriputra vyāḍakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyam na saṃtrāsam āpattavyam /
SA11sanss19u:44: tathā hi tena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ sarvasatvānām arthāya /
SA11sanss19u:46: sacen māṃ vyāḍā bhakṣayeyus tebhyâiva tad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
SA11sanss19u:49: tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbo-
SA11sanss19u:51: dhim abhisambuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre tiryagyonigatāḥ satvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante //
SA11sanss19u:52: corakāntāramadhyagatena śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:54: sarvasvaparityāgakuśalā hi te bodhisatvā mahāsatvôtsṛṣṭakāyenâpi ca bodhisatvena bhavitavyaṃ parityaktapariṣkārôpakaraṇena ca /
SA11sanss19u:56: te cen me satvāḥ pariṣkārôpakaraṇāni haranti tebhyâivâitad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
SA11sanss19u:57: sacen māṃ kecij jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ tatra mayā na dveṣo na krodhôtpādayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:58: teṣām api mayā na kāyena na vacasā na manasâparāddhavyaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:59: evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca paripūriṃ gamiṣyati /
SA11sanss19u:60: anuttarā ca me samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāsannā bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanss19u:61: tathā ca kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre /
SA11sanss19u:62: ete cânye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante //
SA11sanss19u:67: tvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:74: api tu khalu punaḥ satvānām antike mahākaruṇācittam utpādayiṣyāmi /
SA11sanss19u:75: aho vatâlpapuṇyâmī satvā yad eteṣāṃ loke evaṃrūpāṇi pānīyakāntārāṇi prajñāyante /
SA11sanss19u:76_0: tathā punar ahaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya
SA11sanss19u:76_1: satas tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ pānīyakāntārāṇi na prajñāsyante /
SA11sanss19u:77: tathā ca sarvasatvān puṇyaiḥ saṃyojayiṣyāmi yathâṣṭâṅgôpetapānīyalābhino bhaviṣyanti /
SA11sanss19u:78: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye sarvasatvānāṃ kṛtaśo yathā vīryapāramitā tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti //
SA11sanss19u:79: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bubhukṣākāntāramadhyagatena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:81: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye tathā ca svaṃ bu-
SA11sanss19u:83_0: ddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya
SA11sanss19u:83_1: satas tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ evaṃrūpāṇi bubhukṣākāntārāṇi
SA11sanss19u:85: sarvasukhasamarpitās tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ yo yâivâbhiprāyo bhaviṣyati yad yad evâkāṅkṣiṣyanti manasā tat tad eva prādurbhaviṣyati /
SA11sanss19u:86: tad yathâpi nāma devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ manasā sarvaṃ prādurbhavati manasā sarvam utpadyate /
SA11sanss19u:87: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye yathā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ dhārmikâbhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti /
SA11sanss19u:88: avaikalyaṃ ca jīvitapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasatvānāṃ bhaviṣyati sarveṣāṃ sarvataḥ sarvadêti //
SA11sanss19u:100: smṛtimāṃś ca bhavati matimāṃś ca bhavati buddhimāṃś ca bhavati gatimāṃś ca bhavati dhṛtimāṃś ca bhavati prajñāvāṃś ca bhavati /
SA11sanss19u:117: sacet tvam ānanda śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śrāvakabhūmau dharmaṃ deśeyaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:118: tasyāṃ ca dharmadeśanāyāṃ ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve 'rhatvaṃ sākṣāt kuryus tad adyâpi tvayā me śrāvakeṇa śrāvakakṛtyaṃ na kṛtaṃ syāt /
SA11sanss19u:119: sacet punaḥ tvam ānanda bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyâikam api prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ deśayeḥ prakāśayer evam ahaṃ tvayā śrāvakeṇârādhitaḥ syāṃ /
SA11sanss19u:120: tayā ca pūrvikayā dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve 'rhatvaṃ prāpnuyus teṣāṃ cârhatāṃ yad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlama-
SA11sanss19u:123: tat kiṃ manyase ānandâpi tu sa bahu puṇyaskandhaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:127: ataḥ sânanda śrāvakayānikapudgalo bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA11sanss19u:128: ato 'py ānanda bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'parasya bodhisatvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA11sanss19u:138: idam ānanda tasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dharmadānaṃ sarvaśrāvakayānikānām api sarvapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ kuśalamūlam abhibhavati /
SA11sanss19u:140: evaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ samanvāharann asthānam ānandânavakāśo yat sa bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vivartetânuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
SA11sanss19u:146: nu paṇḍitaḥ praviśya layanaṃ tatha ghaṭṭayitvā /
SA11sanss19u:147: vipaśya dharmaṃ imi sarva yoniśo utthāya deśetâlīnacittaḥ //
SA11sanss19u:148: sukhasthito bhoti sadā vicakṣaṇo sukhaṃ niṣaṇṇas tatha dharma bhāsate /
SA11sanss19u:150: caukṣaṃ ca so cīvara prāvaritvā suraktaraṅgaṃ ca prasannaraṅgaiḥ /
SA11sanss19u:151: āsevakaṃ kṛṣṇa tathā daditvā mahāpramāṇaṃ ca nivāsayitvā //
SA11sanss19u:154: sudhautapādaś côpāruhitvā snigdhena śīrṣeṇa mukhena câpi //
SA11sanss19u:155: dharmâsane tatra niṣīdiyānaḥ ekâgra satveṣu samaṃ vipaśyan /
SA11sanss19u:156: upasaṃharec citrakathā bahūś ca bhikṣūnaś cô bhikṣunikās tathâiva //
SA11sanss19u:157: kilāsitāś câpi vivarjayīta na câpi utpādayi khedasaṃjñāṃ /
SA11sanss19u:158: aratiṃ ca sarvāṃ vijahīta paṇḍitaḥ maitrībalaṃ parṣadi bhāvayec ca //
SA11sanss19u:159: bhāṣec ca rātriṃdivam agradharmān dṛṣṭântakoṭīniyutaiḥ sa paṇḍitaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:160: saṃharṣayet tāṃ ca tathâiva toṣayet na câpi kiñcit tatra jātu prārthayet //
SA11sanss19u:161: khŌüdyaṃ ca bhojyaṃ ca tathânnapŌünaṃ vastrŌüṇi śayyâsanacīvarŌüṇi /
SA11sanss19u:162: gilānabhaiṣajya na cintayet saḥ na vijñape-
SA11sanss19u:166: anyatra cinteya sadā vicakṣaṇaḥ bhaveya buddho 'ham ime ca satvā /
SA11sanss19u:167: etac ca me sarvasukhôpadhānaṃ yaṃ dharma śrāvemi hitāya loke //atrâivâha //
SA11sanss19u:168: na kasyacid antaśo dharmapremṇâpy adhikataram anugrahaṃ karoti //
SA11sanss19u:170: adhyeṣayeyur yadi tvāṃ te dharmadānasya kāraṇāt /
SA11sanss19u:172: evaṃ tvaṃ*vāca bhāṣeyā yuṣme vā vijñapaṇḍitāḥ /
SA11sanss19u:173: kathaṃ mahâtmanāṃ śakyaṃ purato bhāṣituṃ mayā //
SA11sanss19u:174: sahasâiṣāṃ na jalpeta tulayitvā tu bhājanaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:176: yadi duḥśīlān paśyesi pariṣāyāṃ bahūn sthitān /
SA11sanss19u:177: saṃlekhaṃ mā prabhāṣe tvaṃ varṇaṃ dānasya kīrtayeḥ //
SA11sanss19u:178: bhaveyur yadi câlpêcchāḥ śuddhāḥ śīle pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
SA11sanss19u:179: maitraṃ cittaṃ janitvā tvaṃ kuryāḥ saṃlekhikīṃ kathām //
SA11sanss19u:182: labdhapakṣas tadā bhūtvā varṇaṃ śīlasya kīrtayeḥ /
SA11sanss19u:209: imāni sāgaramate mantrapadāni dharmabhāṇakena supravṛttāni kṛtvā dharmâsanakena supravṛttāni kṛtvā dharmâsananiṣaṇṇena sarvāṃ parṣadaṃ bodhyākārâbhinirhṛtayā maitryā spharitvā /
SA11sanss19u:210_0: ātmani vaidyasaṃjñām utpādya dharme bhaiṣajyasaṃjñāṃ dharmaśravaṇikeṣv āturasaṃjñāṃ
SA11sanss19u:210_1: tathāgate satpuruṣasaṃjñāṃ dharmanetryāṃ cirasthitikasaṃjñām utpādyêmāni mantrapadāny
SA11sanss19u:211: tasya samantād yo janaśate na māro na mārakāyikā vā devatôpasaṃkramayiṣyanti vicakṣuḥkaraṇe /
SA11sanss19u:212: ye 'py enam upasaṃkramiṣyanti te 'py asya na śakṣyanty antarāyaṃ kartum iti //atrâivâha /
SA11sanss19u:213: dharmabhāṇakena caukṣeṇa śucisamudācāreṇa susnātena śucinivāsitena bhavitavyam iti //
SA11sanss19u:218: tad yathâpi nāma mañjuśrīr nānāgandhavṛkṣāś ca caturdhātusaṃgṛhītā vivardhante /
SA11sanss19u:219: evam eva mañjuśrīr nānāsaṃbhārôpacitaṃ bodhisatvasya kuśalamūlaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:228: tatrânutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāyâiva chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchati vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti samyakpraṇidadhātîty anena rakṣā //
SA11sanss19u:229: utpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayatîty anena śuddhiḥ /
SA11sanss19u:230: anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandaṃ janayati /
SA11sanss19u:231: yāvad utpannānāṃ ca sthitaye bhūyobhāvāya chandaṃ janayatîty ādi /
SA11sanss19u:233: etāni ca nityam apramādâdhiṣṭhitāni kāryāṇi sarvakuśalamūlānāṃ tanmūlatvāt //
SA11sanss19u:235: yāvanta dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ prakīrtitāḥ śīlaśrutaṃ tyāgu tathâiva kṣāntiḥ /
SA11sanss19u:236: sarveṣu mūlaṃ hy ayam apramādo nidhānalambhaḥ sugatena deśita /
SA11sanss19u:240: tad yathā tīvrakopaprasādasya rājño bhaiṣajyatailaparipūrṇabhājanaṃ gṛhītvā picchila-
SA11sanss19u:247: sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
SA11sanss19u:249: evaṃ yāvan manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
SA11sanss19u:251: sarvadharmeṣv āsvādaṃ câdīnavaṃ ca niḥśaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA11sanss19u:253: punar aparam apramādo yat svacittasya damanaṃ paracittasyârakṣā kleśarater aparikarmaṇā dharmarater anuvartanaṃ yāvad ayam ucyate 'pramādaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:254: yasya guhyakâdhipate śraddhā câpramādaś ca tasyânulomikena vīryeṇa kāryaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:255: yena tān apramādakāraṇān śraddhākāraṇāṃś ca dharmān samudānayati /
SA11sanss19u:256: yasya guhyakâdhipate śraddhā câpramādaś ca vīryaṃ ca tena smṛtisaṃprajanye yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:257: yena smṛtisaṃprajanyena sarvān bodhipakṣān dharmān na vipraṇāśayati /
SA11sanss19u:258: yasya guhyakâdhipate śraddhā câpramādaś ca vīryaṃ ca smṛtisaṃprajanyaṃ ca tena yoniśaḥ prayoge yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:259: yoniśaḥ prayukto hi guhyakâdhipate bodhisatvo yad asti tad astîti prajānāti /
SA11sanss19u:261: yāvad asti saṃvṛtyā cakṣur ity ādi //
SA11sanss19u:266: yad yoniśaś câiva vivekacittam aparigrahaḥ sarvasukhasya mūlam iti //āha ca /
SA11sanss19u:270: tatkūlaṃ na svataḥ pāraṃ kim apekṣyâstv apāratā /
SA11sanss19u:271: ātmatvaṃ na svataḥ siddhaṃ kim apekṣya paro bhavet //
SA11sanss19u:272: tadduṣkhena na me bādhêty ato yadi na rakṣasi /
SA11sanss19u:273: nâgāmikāyaduṣkhāt te bādhā tat kena rakṣasi //
SA11sanss19u:275: anyâiva mṛto yasmād anyas tatra prajāyate //
SA11sanss19u:276: anyaś cej jāyate tatra kiṃ puṇyena prayojanaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:278: mṛte garbhagate tāvad anyo bālaḥ prajāyate /
SA11sanss19u:285: kāyaś cet pratimâkāraḥ pesībhasmasu nâsti saḥ //
SA11sanss19u:286: sūkṣmabhāvena cet tatra sthaulyaṃ tyaktvā vyavasthitaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:289: tatra cintâiva me nâsti dṛśyakāyas tu nāśavān /
SA11sanss19u:290: avasthābhiś ca saṃbandhaḥ saṃvṛtyā câiva dṛśyate //
SA11sanss19u:296: na ca trīṇi pradhānāni tathā sattā guṇâpi /
SA11sanss19u:297: pratyekaṃ tryātmakās te 'pi śeṣaṃ nâikavidhaṃ jagat //
SA11sanss19u:299: sukhâder na paṭṭôtpattiḥ paṭṭâdes tu sukhâdayaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:303: svasaṃtāne ca dṛṣṭo 'sau nityeṣu ca kathaṃ yathā /
SA11sanss19u:305: dīpatailaṃ kṣayaṃ yāti kṣīyamānaṃ na lakṣyate /
SA11sanss19u:306: evaṃ bhāvā na lakṣyante kṣīyamānāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ //
SA11sanss19u:308: tatrâbhyāsād ahaṃkāraḥ parasmin kiṃ na jāyate //
SA11sanss19u:311: aprāptam eva tad duṣkhaṃ pratikāryaṃ parâtmanoḥ //
SA11sanss19u:312: ayuktam api ced etat svâtmany astîtaratra na /
SA11sanss19u:313: yad ayuktaṃ nivartyaṃ tat svam anyad vā yathābalaṃ //
SA11sanss19u:314: kṛpayā bahu duṣkhaṃ cet kasmād utpādyate balāt /
SA11sanss19u:319: tair eva nanu paryāptaṃ mokṣeṇâpy arasena kim //
SA11sanss19u:320: evaṃ parârthaṃ kṛtvâpi na mado na ca vismayaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:339: tṛṣṇā parigraho yasya tasya duṣkhaṃ na śāmyati /
SA11sanss19u:341: loke duṣkhâgnitapte ca kā ratiḥ susukhe bhavet /
SA11sanss19u:343: ātmatṛṣṇā ca sarveṣāṃ duṣkhāṇāṃ mūlam uttamaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:344: tasmān nihanmi tām eva satvebhyaḥ svârtham utsṛjan //
SA11sanss19u:348: yad bhayān nôtsṛjāmy etat tad evâdadato bhayaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:349: pratikṣaṇaṃ hi yāty eva kāyaś cittaṃ ca me yataḥ //yadi ni-
SA11sanss19u:352: bodhiḥ kāyena labhyeta nanu labdhā mayâiva sā //
SA11sanss19u:356: yuktyā saṃrakṣya tu dravyaṃ satveṣu vôpayojayet //
SA11sanss19u:357: svakāye parakāye vā yad duṣkhaṃ nêha duṣkhakṛt /
SA11sanss19u:363: kopaḥ kasyârtham adyâpi mṛṣā vā tan mayôditam //
SA11sanss19u:364: svârthaghneṣu yadi dveṣaḥ kṛpā kutra bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanss19u:365: nirdayasyâpi kaḥ kopaḥ parârtho yadi naśyati //
SA11sanss19u:370: nâpi saṃcodayaty enaṃ bhogârthaṃ nôpayāti ca //
SA11sanss19u:378: yāvat satvāḥ sthitās tāvat sarveṣām arthakāriṇaḥ //
SA11sanss19u:380: evam etān karomy eṣa dhātūn ṣaḍ api nirvyathān //
SA11sanss19u:386: kâiva mama duṣkhena duṣkhī syān me bhayād bhayī /
SA11sanss19u:391: skhalan pade pade śocyaḥ parâtmā ca sarvadā //
SA11sanss19u:393: na yuktaṃ yujyate tv atra guṇān dṛṣṭvâdbhutaṃ mahat //
SA11sanss19u:397: vākyaṃ mūrdhnā pratīcchāmi sarvaśiṣyo bhavāmy ahaṃ //
SA11sanss19u:402: tatra yaḥ pṛṣṭhato bhītiṃ śrāvayed anyato 'pi vā /
SA11sanss19u:403: pradviṣṭo vā prasanno vā same prāṇapradaḥ suhṛt //
SA11sanss19u:413: mañjuśrī saṃjñakaṃ yat tat piṇḍībhūtaṃ jagaddhitaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:424: iti jinatanayānāṃ sarvathâtyadbhutānāṃ caritam upanibdhyôpārjitaṃ yac chubhaṃ me /
SA11sanss19u:425: bhavatu sukham anantaṃ dehināṃ tena yāvat sugatapadam ana-
